meanings.sent1: The addled squirrel couldn't find its acorns.

meanings.definition: To make unable to think clearly
meanings.sent1: The loud noise addled his concentration.
meanings.sent2: The confusing instructions addled her mind.
meanings.sent3: Mixing up the ingredients addled the recipe.
meanings.sent4: The unexpected news addled his thoughts like a storm.
meanings.sent5: The bright lights addled his ability to make decisions.

meanings.sent4: The overlapping voices addled his ability to focus.
meanings.sent5: The swirling colors addled her sense of reality.
